text: Names… I did test it, and it did not keep the data. I knew it wouldn’t work via CLI, but I could have sworn I’ve done this in the past in Design Manager with it keeping the data.

Oh well… Interim solution is going to be creating a new group with new set of fields, labeling the old ones as deprecated, then use hubl in the module.html to map the old field data to the new if the new fields are empty.  That will bridge the gap without any downtime, then once we’ve migrated all module instances’ content to the new fields, I’ll remove the old fields.
Hi team! Who knows how to add a *tag filter* to *custom search* modules? :eyes::i_love_you_hand_sign:
